text: we condemn in the strongest possible
terms this egregious display of hatred
bigotry and violence on many sides on
many sides it's been going on for a long
time in our country not Donald Trump not
Barack Obama has been going on for a
long long time it is no place in America
what is vital now is a swift restoration
of law and order and the protection of
innocent lives no citizen should ever
fear for their safety and security in
our society and no child should ever be
afraid to go outside and play or be with
their parents and have a good time
